definitions: the anniversary of the day on which a person was born, typically treated as an occasion for celebration and the giving of gifts

examples.text: I'm getting a dollhouse for my birthday

shortDefinitions: anniversary of day on which person was born

definitions: the day of a person's birth

examples.text: she shares a birthday with Paul McCartney

definitions: the anniversary of something starting or being founded

examples.text: the staff celebrated the twenty-fifth birthday of the paper

shortDefinitions: anniversary of something's origin or foundation
